message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I am confident it could significantly enhance your operations. Considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you for $14,000. This price not only reflects the product's true value but also allows us to maintain a fair transaction. I trust this offer will be favorable to you, and I look forward to discussing how we can proceed. Should you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.
